description: GET BEHIND THE WHEEL OF THE WORLD'S #1 RACING FRANCHISE!   REAL CARS. REAL FAST.  Drive 20 of the world’s fastest, hottest cars, like the Porsche Carrera GT. Each boasts its own style and performance output.  8 CHALLENGING RACE MODES Power through Head-to-Head Action, Highway Battle, and Cop Takeout. Race undercover in 24 covert missions.  3 UNIQUE ENVIRONMENTS Push it to the limit as you burn through exhilarating cityscapes, snaking country roads, and gritty seaside docks.  CUSTOMIZE YOUR VEHICLE   Trick your ride with aftermarket spoilers, multiple wheel options, cool body kits, and paint schemes.  THE BEST 3D RACING VISUALS  Sweeping camera angles and gnarly impact-crash sound effects heighten your driving experience.   EARN PERFORMANCE UPGRADES Upgrade with extras like Boost, Speed, Acceleration, and Handling.  CHECK OUT OUR OTHER GREAT GAMES:  MONOPOLY Classic, TETRIS®, SCRABBLE, The Sims™ 3, & Sudoku
